name: Phytophthora Root Rot
symptoms: ['Yellowing leaves', 'wilting', 'stunted growth', 'root discoloration (dark brown/black)', 'eventual tree death']
control_methods: ['Improving drainage', 'avoiding overwatering', 'planting in raised beds', 'using resistant rootstocks']

name: Macadamia Nut Borer
symptoms: ['Holes in nuts', 'frass (insect excrement) inside nuts', 'premature nut drop', 'damaged kernels', 'dimple marks on shell']
control_methods: ['Orchard sanitation', 'remove infested nuts', 'pheromone traps', 'biological control (parasitic wasps)', 'timely harvesting']

name: Green Vegetable Bug
symptoms: ['Stunted nuts', 'brown spots on kernels', 'discolored pit on kernel', 'premature nut drop', 'reduced kernel quality', 'hidden damage']
control_methods: ['Hand-picking', 'biological control (parasitic wasps)', 'orchard sanitation', 'use ruthenium red dye for detection']

name: Macadamia Felt Scale
symptoms: ['White, felt-like masses on twigs and branches', 'yellowing leaves', 'stunted growth', 'sooty mold growth']
control_methods: ['Pruning infested branches', 'biological control (Metaphycus macadamiae)', 'canopy management']

name: Anthracnose
symptoms: ['Dark, sunken lesions on leaves', 'flowers', 'and fruit', 'premature fruit drop', 'twig dieback']
control_methods: ['Pruning infected parts', 'improving air circulation', 'sanitation', 'avoiding overhead irrigation']

name: Macadamia Husk Spot
symptoms: ['Pale yellow flecks with diffuse halo', 'tan-coloured spots', 'premature nut drop']
control_methods: ['Orchard sanitation', 'improving air circulation', 'timely harvesting', 'avoid sticktight cultivars']

name: Macadamia Husk Rot
symptoms: ['Soft and spongy black lesions', 'greasy decay', 'triggered by insect wounds']
control_methods: ['Improve drainage', 'avoid overhead irrigation', 'orchard sanitation', 'control wounding insects']

name: Botryosphaeria Branch Dieback
symptoms: ['Cankers on branches', 'branch dieback', 'complete tree death']
control_methods: ['Avoid mechanical injury', 'maintain tree vigor', 'biocontrol (Trichoderma hamatum C9)']

name: Pink Disease
symptoms: ['Pinkish-white mycelial growth on bark', 'cankers', 'branch dieback', 'defoliation']
control_methods: ['Pruning infected branches', 'improving air circulation', 'maintaining tree vigor', 'sanitation']

name: Sooty Mold
symptoms: ['Black, powdery coating on leaves, stems, and fruit', 'associated with honeydew from pests']
control_methods: ['Controlling sap-sucking insects', 'washing off mold']

name: Algal Spot
symptoms: ['Greenish-orange, velvety spots on leaves and stems', 'sometimes raised']
control_methods: ['Improving air circulation', 'pruning dense canopy', 'maintaining tree health']

name: Flower Thrips
symptoms: ['Distorted flowers', 'brown streaks on petals', 'reduced fruit set', 'scarring on young nuts']
control_methods: ['Biological control (predatory mites)', 'sticky traps', 'maintaining orchard hygiene']

name: Macadamia Leaf Miner
symptoms: ['Serpentine mines on leaves', 'distorted leaves', 'premature leaf drop']
control_methods: ['Pruning infested leaves', 'biological control (parasitic wasps)', 'maintaining tree vigor']

name: Macadamia Root Knot Nematode
symptoms: ['Galls or swellings on roots', 'stunted growth', 'yellowing leaves', 'reduced yield']
control_methods: ['Crop rotation', 'resistant rootstocks', 'soil solarization', 'improving soil health']

name: Macadamia False Codling Moth
symptoms: ['Holes in nuts', 'frass inside nuts', 'premature nut drop', 'damaged kernels']
control_methods: ['Orchard sanitation', 'pheromone traps', 'biological control (parasitic wasps)', 'timely harvesting']

name: Macadamia Lace Bug
symptoms: ['Stippling (small white spots) on upper leaves', 'yellowing', 'sooty mold on underside']
control_methods: ['Biological control (predatory insects)', 'maintaining tree vigor', 'washing off with water']

name: Macadamia Mealybug
symptoms: ['White, cottony masses', 'stunted growth', 'sooty mold growth']
control_methods: ['Biological control (predatory ladybugs, parasitic wasps)', 'pruning infested parts']

name: Macadamia Aphids
symptoms: ['Curled or distorted new leaves', 'stunted growth', 'sticky honeydew', 'sooty mold growth']
control_methods: ['Biological control (ladybugs, lacewings)', 'washing off with water']

name: Macadamia Mites
symptoms: ['Stippling on leaves', 'bronzing', 'fine webbing on underside of leaves', 'defoliation']
control_methods: ['Biological control (predatory mites)', 'washing off with water']

name: Boron Deficiency
symptoms: ['Stunted growth', 'distorted new leaves', 'cracked stems', 'poor nut set', 'hollow nuts']
control_methods: ['Regular soil testing', 'balanced fertilization']

name: Iron Deficiency
symptoms: ['Interveinal chlorosis (yellowing between veins) on young leaves', 'veins remain green']
control_methods: ['Regular soil testing', 'maintaining optimal soil pH', 'using acidifying fertilizers']
